trans-unit.source: Represents an orthographic projection camera.
trans-unit.target: 代表正視投影照相機。

trans-unit.source: This class specifies an orthogonal projection of a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_3d](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-3d-md.md)] model to a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_2d](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-2d-md.md)] visual surface.
trans-unit.target: 這個類別指定的正交投影[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_3d](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-3d-md.md)]模型到[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_2d](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-2d-md.md)]視覺化介面。

trans-unit.source: Like <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.PerspectiveCamera>, it specifies a position, viewing direction, and "upward" direction.
trans-unit.target: 像<xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.PerspectiveCamera>，它會指定位置中，檢視的方向，以及 「 向上 」 的方向。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.PerspectiveCamera>

trans-unit.source: Unlike <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.PerspectiveCamera>, however, OrthographicCamera describes a projection that does not include perspective foreshortening.
trans-unit.target: 不同於<xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.PerspectiveCamera>，不過，OrthographicCamera 描述不包含透視圖投影。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.PerspectiveCamera>

trans-unit.source: In other words, OrthographicCamera describes a viewing box whose sides are parallel, instead of one whose sides meet in a point at the scene's horizon.
trans-unit.target: 換句話說，OrthographicCamera 描述其兩邊都是平行，而不是一個起點場景的水平滿足其邊緣的檢視方塊。

trans-unit.source: The following diagram shows the difference between orthographic and perspective-foreshortened camera projections.
trans-unit.target: 下圖顯示正視圖和透視圖相機投影之間的差異。

trans-unit.source: ![Orthographic and perspective projection](~/add/media/camera-projections4.png "Orthographic and perspective projection")
trans-unit.target: ![正視圖和遠近景深投射](~/add/media/camera-projections4.png "正視圖和遠近景深投影")

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.OrthographicCamera"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.OrthographicCamera"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.OrthographicCamera"></xref> class with the specified position, projection direction, upward direction, and width.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.OrthographicCamera"></xref>類別具有指定的位置、 投射方向、 向上方向和寬度。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D"></xref> that specifies the camera position.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D"> </xref>指定相機的位置。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D"></xref> that specifies the direction of the camera's projection.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D"> </xref>指定相機的投影的方向。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D"></xref> that specifies the upward direction according to the perspective of the onlooker.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D"> </xref>指定根據視景的檢視方塊的向上方向。

trans-unit.source: The width of the camera's viewing box, in world units.
trans-unit.target: 相機的檢視方塊，以全局單位的寬度。

trans-unit.source: Creates a modifiable clone of this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.OrthographicCamera"></xref>, making deep copies of this object's values.
trans-unit.target: 建立可修改複製品這個<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.OrthographicCamera"> </xref>，製作這個物件值的深層複本。

trans-unit.source: When copying dependency properties, this method copies resource references and data bindings (but they might no longer resolve) but not animations or their current values.
trans-unit.target: 當複製相依性屬性時，這個方法會複製資源參考和資料繫結 （但可能已不能再解析），但不是動畫或它們目前的值。

trans-unit.source: This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects (or any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object).
trans-unit.target: 這個方法用來產生的可修改複本凍結<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>物件 (或任何<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>物件)。</xref:System.Windows.Freezable> </xref:System.Windows.Freezable>

trans-unit.source: For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
trans-unit.target: 為了方便起見，這個方法會遮蔽強型別實作繼承的版本。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: A modifiable clone of the current object.
trans-unit.target: 目前物件的可修改複本。

trans-unit.source: The cloned object's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property will be <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> even if the source's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property was <xref uid="langword_csharp_true." name="true." href=""></xref>
trans-unit.target: 複製的物件<> *> 屬性會是<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>即使來源的<> *> 屬性<xref uid="langword_csharp_true." name="true." href=""></xref>

trans-unit.source: Creates a modifiable clone of this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.OrthographicCamera"></xref> object, making deep copies of this object's current values.
trans-unit.target: 建立可修改複製品這個<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.OrthographicCamera"></xref>物件，製作這個物件目前值的深層複本。

trans-unit.source: Resource references, data bindings, and animations are not copied, but their current values are.
trans-unit.target: 不會複製資源參考、 資料繫結和動畫，但是其目前值。

trans-unit.source: This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects (or any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object).
trans-unit.target: 這個方法用來產生的可修改複本凍結<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>物件 (或任何<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>物件)。</xref:System.Windows.Freezable> </xref:System.Windows.Freezable>

trans-unit.source: For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
trans-unit.target: 為了方便起見，這個方法會遮蔽強型別實作繼承的版本。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: A modifiable clone of the current object.
trans-unit.target: 目前物件的可修改複本。

trans-unit.source: The cloned object's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property will be <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> even if the source's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property was <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 複製的物件<> *> 屬性會是<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>即使來源的<> *> 屬性是<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the width of the camera's viewing box, in world units.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定相機的檢視方塊，寬度的自然單位。

trans-unit.source: Because the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.OrthographicCamera> describes a projection that does not include perspective foreshortening, its viewing box has parallel sides.
trans-unit.target: 因為<xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.OrthographicCamera>描述不包含檢視方塊的投射 foreshortening，其檢視方塊中含有平行的側邊。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.OrthographicCamera>

trans-unit.source: The width of the viewing box can therefore be specified with a single value.
trans-unit.target: 因此，可以使用單一值來指定檢視方塊的寬度。

trans-unit.source: The following diagram shows the difference between orthographic and perspective-foreshortened camera projections.
trans-unit.target: 下圖顯示正視圖和透視圖相機投影之間的差異。

trans-unit.source: ![Orthographic and perspective projection](~/add/media/camera-projections4.png "Orthographic and perspective projection") ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|<xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.OrthographicCamera.WidthProperty>| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
trans-unit.target: ![正視圖和遠近景深投射](~/add/media/camera-projections4.png "正視圖和遠近景深投射")# # 相依性屬性資訊 | | | |-|-| |識別項欄位 |<xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.OrthographicCamera.WidthProperty>| |中繼資料屬性設定為`true`|None |</xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.OrthographicCamera.WidthProperty>

trans-unit.source: Width of the camera's viewing box, in world units.
trans-unit.target: 相機的檢視方塊，以全局單位的寬度。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.OrthographicCamera.Width*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 識別<xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.OrthographicCamera.Width*>相依性屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.OrthographicCamera.Width*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。
